loans.use: to buy eggs, cereals, candies, oil, macaroni, detergent etc.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es: La vivienda en la que vive Rosa es muy humilde pero ella se siente feliz, ya que en ella habita con sus 2 sobrinos a los que cuida y quiere. Rosa tiene 63 años de edad pero eso no le impide ganarse la vida con su elaboración y venta de tamales, actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años, por lo que sus clientes siempre la esperan para comprar sus productos. Rosa desea construir el baño de su vivienda, el cual actualmente solo tiene cubierto con láminas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir el baño de su vivienda y cuidar de la sanidad de su hogar.
texts.en:
The home in which Rosa lives is very simple, but she feels happy, because she lives in it with her two nieces/nephews whom she cares for and loves. Rosa is 63 years old, but this doesn't stop her from earning a living by making and selling tamales, a business that she has had for 10 years. Her customers always wait for her to buy her products.

Rosa wants to build a bathroom for her house, which is now only covered with metal sheeting. For this reason, she is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build the bathroom for her house and care for the health of her household.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and iron to build a bathroom for her house and take care of the health of her household.

loans.name: Fehmida

texts.en: Day after day, increasing expenditures but no ability to meet them compelled Fehmida to initiate her own business selling animals. She is a 44-year-old married woman. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is a mother of four children. She is working very hard to provide her family with the basic necessities of life. She has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She intends to utilize this loan amount to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers. She is confident that she can further expand her business with the help of future loans.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Francisca Noemi

texts.es:
Francisca, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera de dos hijos que asisten a la escuela.

Francisca, ha trabaja desde hace más de 15 años, su primer trabajo fue en una farmacia en donde laboro por 10 años y actualmente tiene dos años y medios de vender tortillas con la ayuda de su hermana; el negocio lo tiene en su casa y trabaja durante todo el día.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar más maíz y leña y de esta forma lograr hacer crecer su negocio,  porque es de ahí de donde dependen sus ingresos para mantener a sus hijos.

El sueño de Francisca, es mejorar su vivienda y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisca, 35 years old, studied until high school. She is a single mother of two children who attend school.

Francisca has worked for more than 15 years. Her first job was in a pharmacy in which she worked for 10 years, and currently she has sold tortillas for two and a half years with the help of her sister. She has the business in her home and she works all day.

She needs the loan to purchase more corn and firewood, and thus be able to grow her business because she depends on it for her income to support her children.

Francisca’s dream is to improve her home and provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase more corn and firewood.

loans.name: Jose Isaias

texts.es: Jose de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, el se dedica al transporte de carga desde hace 11 años, tiene muchos clientes por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar y  por los precios accesibles, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su camión para poder continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose is 31 years old and lives in his own house with his daughter. He makes a living transporting cargo for 11 years. He has many clients because he is responsible when driving and because of his affordable prices. He pays for some of his home expenses with his earnings.

He requests a loan to buy wheel rims and to pay for his truck maintenance, so that he can continue working and therefore earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy wheel rims and to pay for his truck maintenance.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 44 years old and married with four children. With all of her children in school, Julieta works very hard to provide for them.

Julieta runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, coffee, junk foods, home care products and other groceries.

Julieta has been in this business for 11 years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Julieta would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, coffee, junk foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Luz Esterlita

texts.en:
Luz Esterlita is 60 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Luz Esterlita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, personal care products, and other groceries.

Luz Esterlita has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Luz Esterlita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Arcelyn

texts.en:
Arcelyn earns a living by means of fishing. She sells fresh fish to the locals in her place. In addition to that, she also grows seaweed and raises hogs as supplemental income for the entire family.

She is married and has eight children. Her eldest is 15 and the youngest is 5. Her husband's way of earning is by means of fishing.

Arcelyn has requested a loan to buy fishing materials like fishing net, and nylon and to buy pig feed. These will surely help Arcelyn and her family to slowly improve their livelihood. Thus, she will be able to start paying her obligations and continue to provide the needs of her family, including proper nutrition and better living conditions, too.

She hopes to expand her business more in the future through creating a bigger piggery to increase her income and to continue financing the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials (like fishing net and nylon) and pig feed.

loans.name: Julinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Julinda works hard to support her family.

She has a furniture-making business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Julinda is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials like bamboo, wood, nails, etc. for her furniture-making business.

Julinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials like bamboo, wood, and nails for her business.

loans.name: Wynie

texts.en:
Wynie is 52 years old and has two children. She is married and one of her children is still in school.

Wynie is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Wynie requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Wynie has been in pig fattening for seven years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Wynie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Mirna Aracely

texts.es: La vivienda en la que vive Mirna de 33 años de edad es muy humilde pero en ella vive con su padre y su hijo de 18 años de edad al que ha logrado sacar adelante como madre soltera. Mirna se gana la vida desde hace 5 años prestando sus servicios en una empresa cercana. Ella desea construir el servicio sanitario de su vivienda y mejorar el área del lavadero, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir el servicio sanitario y mejorar área de lavadero de su vivienda cuidando de la sanidad de su hogar.
texts.en:
The home in which 33-year-old Mirna lives is very modest, but she lives there with her father and her 18-year-old son whom she has succeeded in supporting as a single mother. For the last 5 years, Mirna has earned a living working for a nearby business.

Mirna wishes to build a bathroom in her home and improve the washing area. She is requesting a FUSAI loan to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to build a bathroom and improve the washing area in her house in order to look after the health and sanitary conditions of her home.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to build a bathroom and improve the washing area of her home

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is a married woman. She describes herself to be patient. She operates a retail business where she sells cooking oil, sugar, bread, rice, flour and other items. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. She will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, flour, cooking oil and other items. Her business goal is to have a big shop within five years. She will use the anticipated profits to puchase additional stock.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, bread, flour, cooking oil and other items

loans.name: Grupo Xexac Las De La Iglesia Group

texts.es:
Martiniana es una mujer muy amable y generosa, tiene 34 años de edad con una linda familia de un hijo que tiene 13 años de edad, ellos viven en una comunidad del caserío Xexac.
Martiniana (es la que se ubica en medio de las tres) gracias al liderazgo que posee en  su comunidad fue electa para ser la líder del grupo denominada Xexac las de la Iglesia. Martiniana con sacrificios y mucha dedicación desde hace 4 años se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes, pero ella con el afán de mejorar su servicio hacia los clientes solicita un préstamo para la compra de más mercadería tales como: golosinas, gaseosas, arroz y aceite.
Su esperanza de vida es fortalecer su negocio con este crédito, pero también mejorar los ingresos económicos de su familia.
texts.en:
Martiniana is a very friendly and generous woman. She is thirty-four years old and has a beautiful family including her thirteen-year-old son. They live in a community in the hamlet of Xexac.

Martiniana (she’s the one in the middle) was elected to be the leader of a group called Xexac las de la Iglesia thanks to the leadership she possesses in her community. She has made sacrifices and dedicated a lot buying and selling grocery products for four years. But she wants to improve her customer service, so she’s asking for a loan to buy more merchandise such as sweets, sodas, rice, and oil.

Her hope in life is to strengthen her business with this loan, but she also wants to improve her family’s income.

loans.use: to buy grocery products like sweets, sodas, rice, and oil.

loans.name: Elmer Osmin

texts.es: Elmer es un hombre emprendedor de 26 años de edad que vive en casa de su propiedad desde hace 9 años, y en ella habita con su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 5 meses de edad. Elmer se dedica a prestar sus servicios de seguridad desde hace 4 años, lo que le permite sacar adelante a su familia. Elmer desea terminar de construir su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía esta no está terminada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: puertas, ventanas, lámina y polines para terminar su vivienda y ofrecer un lugar propio a su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer is a hardworking 26-year-old man who has lived in his own house for 9 years. He lives there with his life partner and his small 5-month-old child. He has worked providing security services for 4 years, which has allowed him to support his family.

Elmer wishes to finish building his house since, as can be observed in the photo, it is not finished. He is requesting a FUSAI loan to invest in doors, windows, sheet metal, and poles in order to finish his home and provide his family with an appropriate place.

loans.use: to invest in doors, windows, sheet metal and poles to finish his house and provide his family with an appropriate place

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 50 años de edad, que se dedica a comercializar carne,  residente del municipio de Chinu, una zona de inclusión social, muy afectada por el conflicto armado, por la pobreza, donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son bajas, pero que está lleno de personas que quieren cambiar la realidad de su hogar, personas como José que con emprendimiento busca generar los recursos para mantener a su familia, personas honestas, personas humildes, personas que hoy quieren exponerse ante los demás como personas de bien, personas trabajadoras con ganas de tener un futuro brillante.
José actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para aumentar sus ventas, el dinero será invertido en cerdos en pie, para posteriormente procesarlos y vender la carne por libras.
texts.en:
José is a 50-year old man, who makes his living selling meat. He is a resident of the Chinu municipality, a socially inclusive area that has been very affected by the armed conflict and by poverty, and where opportunities to get ahead are few. That is why it is full of people who would like to change their living conditions, people like José, who through entrepreneurship, are looking for ways to generate income to support their families -- honest people, people of modest means, people who want to stand before everyone as upstanding citizens, hardworking people who want a bright future.

José is currently applying for a loan in order to increase his sales. The money will be invested in live pigs, in order to then process them and sell the meat by the pound.

loans.use: to buy live pigs in order to process them and sell the meat by the pound.

loans.name: Libertad Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LIBERTAD” iniciará el décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Panamericana, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Juana es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, venta de polleras, venta de salchicha, venta de ropa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Juana es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción de la institución, que se realizó en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace dieciocho años al apoyar a su hija.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de papa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The group “Libertad” will begin its eleventh cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Pan-American Focus Center. It’s made up of nine members and is directed by a board of directors of which Mrs. Juana is president. The businesses that the members of the group have are diverse. Among them are businesses that sell blankets, skirts, sausages, and clothing.

The loan will benefit the small group of micro-entrepreneurs of which Mrs. Juana is a member. She says that it’s been two years since they joined Pro Mujer. They joined at the invitation of the institution which was promoting in their area. Currently, she has a business selling food, and she says that she started the business eighteen years ago to support her daughter.

The loan they are taking out is for increasing capital (to buy wholesale potatoes) which she will get from wholesale sellers in the city of El Alto. Afterwards, she will prepare and sell them from her food stand. This kind of work allows her to generate an income to support her family since she is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the training and the health services it offers.

loans.use: to buy wholesale potatoes.

loans.name: Kumushkan

texts.ru: Кумушкан, 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, работает учителем в школе. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав около 30 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Кумушкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: корова, 2 овцы. На участке, мерою 1,0 Га арендованной земли, она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 29,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кумушкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кумушкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en: Kumushkan is 49 years old, married and together with her husband is raising 2 children. She has a college education and works as a school teacher. To provide additional income for her family, she has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for about 30 years. Thanks to Kumushkan's hard work, today her farm contains a cow and 2 sheep. She also grows barley on 1.0 hectares of leased land. Her monthly income amounts to about 29,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, Kumushkan requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy cows in order to increase her livestock headcount. Kumushkan plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing her livestock quantities and building barns for livestock.

loans.use: to buy additional cows in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Santísima Trinidad Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 5 personas responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal. “SANTÍSIMA TRINIDAD” una de ellos es el Sr. José Eduardo de 40 años conviviente, se dedica al servicio de transporte urbano (moto taxi) todos los días con el mérito de salir adelante. Con su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar a su familia. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es poder comprar otra moto nueva y así pueda ofrecer más de sus servicios. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá para la compra de repuestos de su moto (bujias, llantas, etc.) y así poder trabajar diariamente al servicio de sus pasajeros. A la vez el Sr. José Eduardo se encuentra sentado en medio y se le distingue con una chompa verde, se despide con un abrazo a Kiva y Edaprospo. Agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
A group made up of 5 responsible people with different jobs, these are the members of the communal group "Santísima Trinidad". One of them is José Eduardo, who is 40 years old. He works in urban transportation (via motorcycle taxi) every day, with the virtue of getting ahead. Through his effort he has managed to improve his home and support his family. In order to continue improving his business, his biggest dream is to be able to buy another motorcycle, to offer more of his services.

With the offered loan, he will invest in the purchase of replacement parts for his motorcycle, such as spark plugs, tires, etc., in order to continue working daily to serve his passengers. In the photo, José Eduardo is seated in the middle, with a green shirt. He signs off with a hug to Kiva and Edaprospo. He is thankful for the loan provided, as it will allow him to progress.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for his motorcycle, such as spark plugs, tires, etc.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 40 years old, married, and has three children. She is managing a store for income. Her spouse is a farmer.

Marilou wants to earn more profits to use for education. That is why she is now asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy more grocery items to sell. She will add stocks to sell, like canned goods, bread, eggs, soft drinks, and soap. This will help increase sales capacity in her business and acquire better profits, someday.

She hopes to continue managing her store and save funds for her family's future expenses.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, bread, eggs, soft drinks, and soap to sell.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida has been engaged in farming for a long period of time now. She toils the land and grows rice. This serves as the family's main source of income. Her husband is a farmer, too. She has eight children, three of whom are still attending school.

Adelaida is a hard worker who is desperately trying to develop her business, but she is also a sacrificing mother who deprives herself for the sake of her children.

She has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner, Community Economic Ventures, Inc. (CEVI) to purchase fertilizer. That would definitely help her progress. It would help to improve the yield of her farm and enable her to improve her financial income, as well.

Adelaida is hoping that she will become successful in the years to come.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Turdububu

texts.ru: Турдубубу, 45 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. Она занимается животноводством и полеводством на протяжении многих лет. У Турдубубу в хозяйстве есть 6 коров и 46 овец. На 1,32 ГА земли она выращивает картофель для реализации и внутрихозяйственного потребления. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 32,000 сом (KGS). Также Турдубубу с супругом сдают в аренду юрту. В целях дальнейшего развития ее хозяйства, Турдубубу решила обратиться в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец для откорма и реализации. Свои доходы она будет и дальше вкладывать в бизнес.
texts.en: Turdububu is 45 years old, married and has 3 children. She has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for many years. Turdububu's farm contains 6 cows and 46 sheep. She grows potatoes on 1.32 hectares of land for sale and household consumption. Her monthly profit amounts to about 32,000 som (KGS). Turdububu and her husband also rent out a yurt. To continue developing her business, Turdububu decided to request a loan in the amount of 110,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy 10 sheep for fattening up and resale. She will continue investing her income into the business.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is a sari-sari store owner and she has been proficiently running this business for almost 19 years in the town of Catigbian, Bohol. Her husband works hard as a driver to support the needs of their six children - five adults and one school-aged child.

Rosario is a 58-year-old woman who dreams of improving her business in order to have a better means of living. Thus, she is asking for a loan for additional capital to buy stocks, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, eggs, cooking oil, sugar, flour, powdered chocolate drink, milk, chips, candies, bread, laundry soap, and toiletries.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, spices, eggs, cooking oil, sugar, flour, powdered chocolate drink, milk, chips, candies, bread, laundry soap, and toiletries.

loans.name: Buensa

texts.ru: Буенса, 55 лет, вдова, есть 2 детей. У Буенсы образование средне-специальное, она работает на предприятии. В качестве дополнительного дохода занимается животноводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы. Ежемесячный совокупный доход около 12,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на содержание семьи. Поэтому Буенса обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы она направит на развитие бизнеса и покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Buensa is 55 years old, a widow and has 2 children. Buensa has a secondary-specialized education and works at a factory. To provide additional income, she is involved in animal husbandry. Her farm contains 2 cows. Her combined monthly income amounts to about 12,000 som (KGS), but this money is not sufficient to support the family. This is why Buensa requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy cows. She will use the earnings to develop her business and buy furniture for home.

loans.use: to buy cows in order to increase her income and grow her business

loans.name: Melchie

texts.en:
Melchie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 29 years old and has three children who are in school.

Melchie has a ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional stocks of ready-to-wear to sell to her customers.

Melchie has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of ready-to-wear to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Las Canelas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS CANELAS” iniciará el décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Panamericana, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maruja es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ropa, venta de abarrotes, venta de comida, venta de carne.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maruja es integrante, ella indica que son siete ciclos que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia con el primer préstamo que solicito en la institución hace más de tres años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.

En la foto no aparece la señora Adela, ya que después del desembolso tuvo que ir a su espacio de venta.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Canelas" will begin its eleventh loan cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana regional center. It is composed of nine members and is led by a board of directors where Señora Maruja is the president. The businesses that the members of the communal association run are varied. Among them are selling clothing, selling groceries, selling food, and selling meat.

The loan that they will take out will benefit these micro-entrepreneurs, of whom Señora Maruja is one. She indicates that she joined Pro Mujer seven [loan] cycles ago, entering because of the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. She now has a business of selling clothing. She lets it be known that she learned this business on her own initiative with the first loan that she requested from the institution, more than three years ago.

The loan that she will take out now is for the increase of capital to buy clothing wholesale, which she will acquire from the wholesale vendors in the city of El Alto and later sell at her sales stand. This form of work allows her to generate income to support her family economically, since she is married and has five children.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training and the health area that the institution offers.

Señora Adela doesn't appear in the photo, since after the disbursement she had to go to her sales space.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Dismas

texts.en:
Dismas is a married man who has one child. When he was asked to describe himself in a word, he said “patient.”

For the past year Dismas has run a business where he repairs various electronic items. His shop is located in a good area, and his primary customers are locals.

This will be Dismas’ first loan through Kiva's field partner SMEP Microfinance Bank. He will use his 20,000 KES loan to buy tools for his trade.

loans.use: to buy tools for his electronics repair trade.

loans.name: Neveodé  Kossiwa

texts.fr: Neveode est une veuve femme âgée de 65 ans qui vit avec ses cinq enfants à charge. Neveode est une revendeuse de condiments et de produits alimentaires  résidant à Agoè. Neveode achète ses marchandises quatre fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à la devanture de son domicile. Neveode sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de sucre, des bidons d’huile, des bols du haricot et des tas de condiments en vue de bien revendre afin d’avoir un bénéfice pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à leur épanouissement.
texts.en: Neveode is 65 year old widow who lives with her five dependent children. Neveode lives in Agoé and sells condiments and food products. Neveode buys her merchandise four times a month at the market and sells her goods under a canopy in front of her home. Neveode requests this loan to order bags of sugar, cans of oil, bowls of beans and piles of condiments so that she can make good sales and realise a profit to help pay for her children's education and enable them to thrive.

loans.use: to buy 02 sacks of sugar, 02 cans of oil, 09 bowls of beans and 05 units of condiments.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 35 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child in school.

Roselyn is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Roselyn has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Roselyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 44 years old and married, with four children. With two children currently in school, Delia works very hard to provide for them.

Delia runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Delia has been in this business for 19 years and she sells a variety of items, such as candies, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, cooking oil, and seasonings.

In the future, Delia would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.ru: Мухайё молодая девушка из города Душанбе. Ей 24 года. Она добрая и талантливая девушка. Она занимается шитьем женской одежды. Мухайё счастливая девушка, она скоро выходит замуж. Мухайё готовится к своей свадьбе и уже шьет свои свадебные наряды. Она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы покрыть свадебные расходы и отремонтировать дом. Мухайё очень сильно ждет своей свадьбы и надеется, что Вы тоже поделитесь ее радостью.
texts.en: Muhayo is a young woman from the city of Dushanbe. She is 24 years old. She is a kind and talented young woman. She is involved in sewing women's clothing. Muhayo is a happy young woman - she is getting married soon. She is preparing for her wedding and already sewing her wedding costumes. She requested this loan to cover wedding expenses and repair her house. Muhayo eagerly awaits her wedding and hopes that You will also share her happiness.

loans.use: to pay for her wedding and repair her house

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is a young woman of 21. She is already married, but she does not have any children yet. Still, Jessica works hard for her needs and to help her husband, who is working in construction.

Jessica makes tabliya (chocolate bars made from roasted and ground cacao seeds). She also sells prepaid mobile top-up, chorizo (spanish sausage), and longganisa (cured sweet pork sausage).

Jessica is asking for a loan to buy more cacao seeds, electronic prepaid top-up, chorizo, longganisa, and additional capital to start buying and selling dried fish.

Jessica hopes to make her business bigger, so she can have a better life with her husband and future children.

loans.use: to buy cacao seeds, electronic prepaid top up, chorizo (spanish sausage), longganisa (cured sweet pork sausage) and dried fish.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es: Maria de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijas, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 16 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 58 years old and lives with her three daughters in a home she owns. She has had a small store located in her residence for 16 years. She has many customers due to her good prices and the friendliness she has when selling.

She is seeking a loan to be able to buy more soups, eggs, staple grains, drinks, snacks, pastries, etc., in order to have increased earnings for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, staple grains, drinks, snacks, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a fish-vending business in the Philippines.

Elvira requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Elvira has been in this business for 49 years now. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Elvira would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Santander

texts.es:
Él es Santander un hombre, tranquilo, fresco, que disfruta su vida, se dedica principalmente a elaborar artesanías en madera, pero también tiene un negocio de cría de cerdos, heredo sus conocimientos en artesanías de su padre, pero optó por montar un criadero de cerdos para complementar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
Santander quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar cerdos, alimento de engorde, vacunas y vitaminas, puesto que quiere estar preparado para la temporada de venta de cerdos, una época del año donde percibe ingresos muy importantes que ayudan a que su familia tenga calidad de vida, goce de una buena navidad y poder invertir en adecuaciones para su hogar y lo más importante es, que estos ingresos ayudan a incentivar y hacer llegar sus productos artesanales a más personas puesto que puede comprar mayor cantidad de insumos.
texts.en:
He is Santader, an easy-going man who enjoys life. He earns a living mainly by making wooden crafts, but he also has a pig-farming business. He learned the crafts trade from his father, but he decided to set up a pig farm to supplement the income needed to cover his household expenses.

Santander wants to take out a loan to buy pigs, fattening feed, vaccines, and vitamins because he wants to be ready for the pig sales season. This is the time of the year when he earns a significant income, which allows him to improve his family's standard of living, enjoy a nice Christmas, and invest in home improvements. The most important thing is that this income helps him boost his crafts business because by being able to buy more crafts supplies, he can make more products reach more people.

loans.use: to boost his pig-farming business.

loans.name: Jessa

texts.en:
Jessa is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jessa is 30 years old, and her child is in school.

Jessa has a vehicle painting business in the Philippines. Jessa requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

Jessa has been in this business for 10 years. Jessa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her vehicle painting business.

loans.name: Olmahon

texts.ru: Олмахон, 29 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 сыновей и дочку. У Олмахон - среднее образование. Вместе с мужем и детьми Олмахон занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 2010 году, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Олмахон, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 9 овец, также обрабатывает 0,40 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает кукурузу и пшеницу. Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Олмахон обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 8 овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Олмахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на обучение детей.
texts.en: Olmahon is 29 years old, married and together with her husband raising 2 sons and a daughter. Olmahon has a secondary education. Olmahon, her husband and children are involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started this business in 2010 with a purchase of livestock with 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Olmahon's hard work, today her farm contains 9 sheep. She also cultivates 0.40 hectares of land, where she primarily grows corn and wheat. Her monthly income amounts to 17,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, Olmahon requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy 8 sheep for fattening up and resale. Olmahon plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing her livestock quantities and saving money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 8 sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Julian Andres

texts.es:
Julián es un hombre de 25 años de edad una persona que quiere iniciar un negocio de venta de mercancía, puesto que sueña con estudiar, ser un profesional y comprar una vivienda a su querida madre.
Julián es un hombre de pocas palabras, una persona que prefiere demostrar con hechos,
Pero Julián no quiere y no puede hacerlo solo, necesita de tu apoyo, un inicio, un impulso económico para la compra de calzado, accesorios y ropa.
texts.en:
Julián is 25 years old and a person who wants to start a business selling merchandise. He dreams of studying, becoming a professional and buying a house for his beloved mother.

Julián is a man of few words, a person who prefers demonstrating through his deeds. However, Julián doesn't want to, and cannot, do it alone. He needs your help, a start, an economic impetus for the purchase of footwear, accessories and clothing.

loans.use: to buy footwear, accessories and clothes.

loans.name: Xayal

texts.en:
Xayal is 25 years old and a refugee from the Bilasuvar region. He is single and is the only one working in the family. He is a hard-working man.

He is trying to earn enough money by being a trader in car parts and accessories, to take care of his family's needs. He is very energetic and passionate about his job. There are many Soviet-style and foreign cars which require some car parts and, for this, the customers turn to Xayal.

Xayal is a well-known expert in identifying the customers' needs. He has a small shop where he has car accessories. In the local market, there aren't many people who can provide the real car parts. In fact, the original car accessories are very easily identifiable. Xayal is aware of this factor and that's why his customers have great belief and trust in him.

Currently, Xayal needs an AZN 1,200 loan to buy more car parts. Hopefully, Kiva lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy more car parts.

loans.name: Roxan

texts.en:
Roxan is a resident of Catigbian, Bohol. She is 24 years old and a married woman. She earns a living through raising pigs. Her husband also earns income as a mason on a construction site.

Currently, she has a sow and piglets to raise. This means that she needs capital to finance feed for them. That is why she is asking for a loan; she will buy sacks of feed.

Roxan’s main goal in life is to be successful in her business, so that in the future she will have enough money to give a better means of living to her family.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase an additional fishing net and gasoline for her fishing business.

Lolita has been in this business for three years. Lolita earns additional income from pig fattening.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, so she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Lolita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to afford sending her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an additional fishing net and gasoline.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара уроженка района Спитамен. Она на районе живет вместе с мужем. Гулсара спокойная и добрая женщина. Она работает уборщицей. На протяжении 10 лет, Гулсара занимается уборщицей. Так она зарабатывает на жизнь. Гулсара мало получает от работы, она не может копить денег, чтобы запасти на случай жизни. Гулсара мечтала отремонтировать свой дом освежить и покрасит вокруг дома. Она хочет покрасить вороту и стены. Гулсара фотографировала возле у себя дома. Ей не хватает денег, и по этой причине Гулсара просит кредит. Она нуждается помощи.
texts.en: Gulsara is a native of the Spitamen district. She lives there with her husband. Gulsara is a calm and kind woman. She had been working as a cleaning lady for 10 years. This is how she earns a living. Gulsara earns very little from her job and cannot save money for life's emergencies. Gulsara dreamed about repairing her house, freshening it up and painting around it. She wants to paint a fence and walls. Gulsara is pictured here next to her house. She does not have enough money and requesting this loan. She needs help.

loans.use: to purchase paint and other necessities in order to paint her house

loans.name: Shukrona

texts.ru: Шукрона начинающий модный дизайнер. Ей 19 лет. Она одна из лучших учениц колледжа. Шукрона хочет скорее научиться шитьи поэтому все свое время тратит на шитье. У нее есть своя швейная машинка (справа), но она ручная и на ней шить очень дискомфортно, и тому же она старая. Шукрона хочет купить новою современную машинку, чтобы процесс работы доставлял ей только комфорт и удовольствие, чтобы потом насладится своим результатом работы. У нее недостаточно средств и она обращается за помощью к кредиторам Кива.
texts.en: Shukrona is a starting-out modern designer. She is 19 years old. She is one of the best students in college. Shukrona wants to learn sewing as fast as she can and spends all of her time sewing. She has her own sewing machine (on the right), but it is not automated, making sewing on it very uncomfortable because it is old. Shukrona wants to buy a new, modern sewing machine, so that the sewing process is comfortable and satisfying and leading to good work results. She does not have enough money to make this purchase and comes to the Kiva lenders for help.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as trustworthy. She operates a retail business where she sells vegetables and fruits. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a strategic place and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge as inadequate working capital.

Lucy will use the KES 60,000 loan to buy more stock of vegetables and fruits. Her business goal is to have a large scale grocery store within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have an improved livelihood. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy more stock of vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Rajabmahmad

texts.ru: Этого джентльмена зовут Рачабмахмад. Ему 42 года. Он проживает на районе Хуросон. У него трое детей. Сыновьям 14 и 8 лет. Дочке 18 лет. Старший сын учится в средней школе. Рачабмахмад хочет, чтобы его дети учились и стали образованными людьми. Его жена домохозяйка и свободное время помогает мужу в работе. Рачабмахмад с детства мечтал освоить деятельность отца и идти по его стопам. Он родился в семье дехканов. Рачабмахмад 15 лет занимается выращиванием мелко рогатого скота. У него имеется вся удобство для развития животноводческой деятельности. Рачабмахмад планирует увеличить поголовья скота и расширить деятельность. Для купли скота и него нет денег, и он решил взять кредит и приобрести несколько скота. Рачабмахмад нуждается на Вашу поддержку. Поддержите его!
texts.en: The name of this gentleman is Rajabmahmad. He is 42 years old and lives in the Khuroson district. He has three children. His sons are 14 and 8 years old, and daughter is 18 years old. The oldest son attends a secondary school. Rajabmahmad wants all of his children to study and become educated people. His wife is a homemaker and helps her husband with work in her free time. Since his childhood, Rajabmahmad dreamed about learning his father's trade and following in his footsteps. He was born into a family of farmers. Rajabmahmad plans to increase his livestock headcount and expand his business. He does not have money to buy livestock, so he decided to obtain a loan and buy livestock in order to expand his business. Rajabmahmad relies on Your support. Please support him!

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to expand his business

loans.name: Hayda Marina

texts.es: Hayda es una joven de 24 años de edad, que hoy está ante toda la comunidad Kiva solicitan un apoyo económico para iniciar un negocio de papelería. La principal razón es que ella quiere lograr su independencia económica, tener dinero para estudiar y suplir sus necesidades, igualmente quiere conformar un núcleo familiar solido con su pareja y traer hijos al mundo cuando sea una empresaria solida financieramente hablando.
texts.en: Hayda is a young women, 24 years old, that is today in front of all the Kiva community requesting an economic help to start a stationery shop business. The main reason is that she wants to achieve her economic independence, to have money to study and supply her needs. Equally, she wants to shape up her immediate family with her partner and bring children into the world whenever she is, financially speaking, a stable businesswoman.

loans.use: To start a stationery shop business

loans.name: Lilia

texts.ru: Lilia в возрасте 42 лет, замужем и работает в сфере сельском хозяйстве. Лилия владелец 4,3 га яблочного сада. Сад старенький и нуждается в обновление. Этой осеню она хочет очистить 1,3 га и посадить 900 саженцы яблони. Для очистки сада и посадки саженцев она нуждается в финансовых ресурсах, поэтому она обратилась к этому кредиту. В будущем Лилия хочет обновить все 3 га сада. Своевременное уход за плантациями приведет к богатому и качественному урожаю, что означает прибыль для развития бизнеса в будущем и, как следствие, создание новых рабочих мест.
texts.en: Lilia is 42 years old, married and works in the agricultural sector. Lilia is the owner of a 4.3-hectare apple orchard. The orchard is old and needs to be renovated. She wants to clear 1.3 hectares this fall and plant 900 apple seedlings. To accomplish this, she needs financial resources and this is why she requested this loan. In the future, Lilia wants to redo the remaining 3 hectares of the orchard. Timely care of the plantation will yield a rich and quality harvest, leading to a profit for future business development and creation of new jobs.

loans.use: to clear orchard space and plant new apple seedlings

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Yawa est une femme mariée âgée de 30 ans résidante à Agoè. Mère de quatre enfants, Yawa est une marchande de  produits d’alimentaires qu’elle revend dans sa boutique à domicile. Yawa s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et sollicite ce prêt pour commander des cartons de tomates et de spaghettis. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Yawa compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider sa famille à avoir un bon épanouissement et une bonne éducation scolaire à ses enfants.
texts.en: Yawa is a married woman of 30, who lives in Agoé. She has four children, and she is a food products merchant. She sells her goods in her store at home. Yawa buys her stock twice a month at the market and requests this loan to order boxes of tomatoes and spaghetti. With the profit margin that she hopes to make, Yawa plans to improve her offer and help her family to thrive and to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to buy 10 cartons of spaghetti and 07 cartons of tomatoes.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Doña Sonia es una mujer muy esforzada. Solicita un préstamo de quinientos dólares ($500), para la compra de materiales de construcción necesarios para ampliar su vivienda. Esto con el fin de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Sonia is a very hardworking woman. She's applying for a loan of five hundred dollars ($500) to purchase construction materials necessary for expanding her home. This is for the purpose of improving her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase materials to expand her home.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia es una microempresaria que reside en el municipio de Bogotá en compañía de su cónyuge, ella encontró la oportunidad de iniciar su propio negocio al presentársele la oportunidad de arrendar el resto de área cuadrada del local en donde brinda servicios de giros nacionales y encomiendas a través de empresas reconocidas en Colombia, aparte de que complementaban muy bien con su nueva actividad.  Ella aperturó un café internet, fotocopiadora, servicio de llamadas a todos los operadores y accesorios para celulares, todo un conjunto de soluciones en un mismo lugar. Todos los días de la semana sus clientes pueden llegar a partir de las 9 a.m. hasta las 9 p.m. aparte de que la zona donde está ubicado es un sector comercial y existe gran afluencia de personal, por lo que tuvo que contratar a una empleada.  En la actualidad realizó una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en paquetes de minutos, recargas, un servicio de internet más ágil y nuevos accesorios para celulares. Claudia tiene muchas metas y sobre todo aquellas que incorporan a sus dos hijos a quienes les forma en valores y emprendimiento, ella desea que ellos también tengan su propio negocio
texts.en:
Claudia, a small business owner, lives in Bogotá with her spouse. She saw the chance to start her own business when given the opportunity to lease the remaining square footage of the local which provides local services in domestic money orders and parcels through well-known companies in Colombia. Besides, she knew they would complement her new business very well. She opened an internet café and a photocopying center, and also offers telephone services and cell phone accessories to all the operators, combining all solutions in one place.

Every day of the week, her customers can come in from 9:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. In addition, her business is located in a commercial area where there is a large influx of people, so she had to hire an employee. Currently, she is requesting a loan, her first through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to invest in packages of minutes, chargers, faster internet service, and new cell phone accessories. Claudia has many goals, especially those which include her two children in whom she instills values and encourages entrepreneurship. She also wishes for them to have their own businesses.

loans.use: to invest in packages of minutes, chargers, faster internet service, and new cell phone accessories.

loans.name: Maria Rocio

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 46 años de edad, se dedica a vender mercancía a sus amigos, familiares y conocidos, principalmente lociones y cremas corporales, actividad que realiza para complementar los ingreso suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar y familia la cual está conformada por su esposo y sus dos hijas adolescentes de 17 y 20 años de edad.
Desde que María realiza su profesión, la calidad de vida en su hogar ha ido en aumento, hay más capital para invertir   en mejoras locativas, en una mejor alimentación y esto la motiva a seguir realizando su profesión, por ello quiere solicitar un monto de dinero para la compra de mercancía de uso personal, principalmente lociones.
texts.en:
Maria is a 46 years old women, that makes a living selling merchandise to her friends, family and acquaintances, mainly lotions and corporal creams. She carry put this activity to complement her sufficient incomes for the maintenance of her household and family, which is conformed by her husband an her two teenager daughters of 17 and 20 years old.

Since Maria carries out her occupation, the life quality of her household has increased. There is more capital to invest in on-site repairs, in a better diet and that motivates her to keep carrying out her occupation. Therefore she request an amount of money to buy personal-products, mainly lotions.

loans.use: To buy personal-products, mainly lotions

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, ella se dedica al cultivo de yuca desde hace 2 años y vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de abonos, controles de plagas y fertilizantes para poder tener una buena cosecha de yuca y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: The young woman whose face has been blurred is 29 years old, and lives in a high risk area.  She has been engaged in cultivating yucca for two years, and sells her products in the various markets near her home.  The profits that she makes enable her to pay some of her household expenses.  The young woman lives in her own home with her family.  She is requesting a loan to purchase organic fertilizer, pest control products, and fertilizers so that she can have a good yucca harvest, which will enable her to have better income.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer, pest control products, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es:
Domingo es un hombre de 35 años de edad, es casado con una linda familia por la que todos los días se esmera para brindarles todo lo necesario, él tiene 2 hijas de las edades entre 7 y 20  años.
Domingo para generar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la albañilería, construyendo una variedad de casas modernas, con esta labor él tiene 20 años de realizarlo, gracias a sus años de experiencia mucha gente lo busca con frecuencia. Domingo desde hace algunos días se ha puesto a pensar en que es necesario remodelar su casa, pues se encuentra en condiciones que no son las adecuadas para su familia por esa razón solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de materiales tales como: cemento, cal, arena.
Este crédito contribuirá para que su casa tenga mejor presentación y mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Domingo is a 35 year old man who's married and has a lovely family, and he works hard every day to provide them with all of the necessities. He has two daughters ages 7 and 20. To earn income and support his family Domingo works as a mason, building a variety of modern houses. He's been doing this type of work for 20 years, and thanks to his years of experience people turn to him often. 

For several days he has thought about what's needed to remodel his house, since the condition that it's in isn't appropriate for his family. This is the reason why he's applying for a loan that he'll use to purchase materials such as: cement, lime, and sand. This loan will contribute towards his house being more presentable and will improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase materials such as: cement, lime, and sand to remodel his home.

loans.name: Jose Oswaldo

texts.es: José tiene 19 años de edad y vive junto a su madre en vivienda propia, él es un joven responsable que siempre busca la manera de brindar lo mejor a su madre. José se dedica a prestar sus servicios en una empresa municipal, en la que presta sus servicios lo que le permite sacar adelante a su familia. José desea encementar el piso de su vivienda que es de tierra y reparar las paredes agrietadas de su vivienda, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y mano de obra para encementar el piso y reparar las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en: José is 19-years old and lives with his mother in their own home. He is a responsible young man who is always looking for a way to give his mother the best. José loans his services in a municipal company, which allows him to support his family. José wants to set a concrete floor in his home that is currently dirt and to repair the cracked walls in his home. So, he is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick and pay labor to set in a concrete floor and repair the walls of his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick and pay labor to set in a concrete floor and repair the walls of his home.

loans.name: Diosis Del Carmen

texts.es: Diosis de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Diosis, 46, lives in her own home with her husband and son.  For several years, she has been engaged in making and selling tortillas.  Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers.  She manages to pay some of her household expenses with the profits she earns.  She is requesting a loan to purchase quintals of corn and lime, which will enable her to continue making tortillas and, in this way, have better income, and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase quintals of corn and lime.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto es gran padre de familia con grandes aspiraciones en la vida, él tiene 54 años de edad es casado, esta familia vive en una comunidad de la aldea la ladrillera.
Rigoberto trabaja de sol a sol para generar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia, él tiene 10 de trabajar como peluquero, con estos ingresos no le es suficiente cubrir los gastos de su familia por esa razón se dedica también a la compra y venta de pilones de café.
Para Rigoberto el bienestar de su familia es muy importante, por esa razón a considerado necesario solicitar un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción tales como: cemento, block, aren; esto lo utilizara para la remodelación de su casa.
Sus esperanzas de vida es fortalecer su negocio, mejorar los ingresos económicos para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is a great father with big dreams in life. He is 54 years old and married. He and his family live in a neighborhood of the municipality of La Ladrillera.

Rigoberto works from sunup to sundown to produce income and help his family get ahead. He has worked for ten years as a barber, but this income is not sufficient to cover his family's expenses. For that reason, he also works buying and selling coffee plants.

For Rigoberto, his family's well-being is very important, and therefore he has found it necessary to apply for a loan to buy construction materials such as cement, blocks and sand, which he will use to renovate his home.

His hopes in life are to strengthen his business and improve his income so that his family can live better.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, blocks, and sand to renovate his home.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
Abel es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable y muy amable, tiene 37 años de edad con una linda familia de un hijo, esta querida familia vive en una comunidad de Santo Tomas La Unión.
Abel con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes, este negocio lo tiene él desde hace 10 años, pero con el fin de llamar la atención de los clientes cuenta con el servicio de nixtamal, con estos ingresos a su familia mantiene.
Abel está solicitando un crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de más mercaderías de abarrotes como: golosinas, azúcar, gaseosas y productos de consumo diario. Con esta inversión el espera satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los clientes. Su esperanza de vida es fortalecer su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Abel is a very hardworking, responsible and very friendly man. He is 37-years old and has a lovely family with one son. This dear family lives in a community of Santo Tomas La Unión. Abel, with the desire to get his earnings and support his family, works buying and selling grocery items. He has had this business for 10 years, but in order to draw the attention of the customers, he sells corn. With these earnings he maintains his family.

Abel is asking for a loan to buy more grocery merchandise such as candy, sugar, soft drinks, and daily consumption products. With this investment he hopes to better satisfy his customer's needs. His life wish is to strengthen his business and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy grocery store products such as: candy, sugar, soft drinks, and daily consumption products.

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Annaliza works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Annaliza is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell for her rice business.

Annaliza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es: Carlos de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el tiene un negocio de venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace 8 años tiene muy buena clientela pues vende su comida a un buen precio su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y con las ganancias que obtiene cubre algunos gastos de su hogar, el solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus tortas y hamburguesas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 37 years old, lives on his own house with her wife. He has a business of sandwiches and burgers since 8 years old. He has a good clientele due he sells his food at a good price. His business is located close to his residence, and with the earnings he obtains he cover some of his household expenses. 

He request a loan that allows him to buy everything necessary for the elaboration of his pies and burgers like: bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise and mortadellas among other ingredients, and therefore to be able to have a better economic income.

loans.use: comprar pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo es un hombre de 44 años de edad que vive con su compañera de vida y sus 4 hijos dos niñas de 14 y 9 años y dos varones de 7 y 3 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que siempre busca la manera de llevar lo necesario a su familia, ya que es consiente que en su vivienda los gastos son muchos, por lo que presta sus servicios desde hace 12 años contando con una gran experiencia. Guillermo desea mejorar las condiciones en que vive su familia, por lo que desea encementar el piso que es de tierra y cambiar el techo, ya que las tejas se están quebrando, por lo que pondrá lámina, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina, madera, cemento, arena y grava para cambiar el techo y encementar el piso de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a 44-year-old man who lives with his life partner and their 4 children; two girls, aged 14 and 9 and two boys, aged 7 and 3. He is a hardworking man who is always looking for a way to bring what is necessary to his family since he is aware that in his home the costs are many, reason why he has been offering his services for 12 years now, having a vast experience.

Guillermo wishes to improve the conditions in which his family lives. It is why he wants to set his home's floor in cement, which is made of soil, and change the roof since the tiles are breaking down which is why he'll put metal sheets. He is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest in metal sheets, wood, cement, sand, and gravel to change the roof and set his home's floor in cement.

loans.use: to invest in metal sheets, wood, cement, sand, and gravel to change the roof and set his home's floor in cement.

loans.name: Dockers Group

texts.en:
From Tujijenge Tanzania, Shiza, who is in her mid-30s, is single with two children, one in school and one yet too young to attend. A food vendor for 15 years now, Shiza has a mamalishe business serving food such as cooked rice, ugali, bananas with meat, beans and vegetables. She does business from 6 am to 9 pm each working day and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

Shiza's previous loan, which has been repaid, was used to buy mamalishe cooking ingredients. She is now requesting her third loan, to be shared with Dockers's other group member, to restock items in her store. The group members will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan. 

Shiza's dream is to expand her business by building another classic restaurant.

loans.use: to restock items in her mamalishe store.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre casado de 33 años, actualmente se encuentra sin empleo, solo trabaja esporádicamente para una persona realizando transporte en motocicleta.
Carlos cansado de esa situación de trabajar solo por días quiere tomar un riesgo, quiere dejar los miedos, y así emprender su propio camino, pero para ello necesita de tu apoyo para comprar una motocicleta y dedicarse de lleno a su profesión.
Su principal objetivo es brindarles una excelente calidad de vida a su familia conformada por su esposa y sus 4 hijos de 16, 15, 10, 8 años de edad.
Si todo marcha bien y tiene excelentes resultado un sueño a largo plazo sería tener un hogar propio.
texts.en:
Carlos is a married 33 year old man who's currently unemployed. He only works sporadically providing motorcycle taxi service for somebody else. He's tired of only working days at a time and wants to take a chance, to leave his fear behind and forge his own path. But for that he needs your support to purchase a motorcycle and fully commit himself to his profession.

His main objective is to provide an excellent standard of living to his family, which consists of his wife and his 4 kids ages 16, 15, 10, and 8. If everything goes well and he gets excellent results one of his long-term dreams is to have a home of his own.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle to start his self-employment.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Motivada por el crecimiento que ha tenido los últimos años e impulsada por la motivación y la sensación de que está temporada de diciembre será fantástica la señora Sandra quiere solicitar un préstamo para impulsar su línea de propia, comprando maquinaria que hagan más eficientes sus procesos y ayuden a sacar mayor cantidad de mercancía en el menor tiempo posible.

La empresaria es madre de 2 hijos de 	4 y 13 años de edad, centra todos sus esfuerzos en sus muchachos, pues tiene como objetivo principal en la vida pagare una excelente educación.

Actualmente la empresaria se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una máquina recubridora, telas e insumos para la confección de su línea propia de ropa.
texts.en:
Motivated by the growth that she has had in the last years and drove by the motivation and feeling that this December season will be amazing, Sandra requests a loan to boost her own line of clothing, by buying machinery that makes her processes more efficient and help to launch a bigger quantity of merchandise in the fewer possible time.

The businesswoman is mother of 2 children of 4 and 13 years old. She focus all her efforts on her young children, thus she has as her life primary goal to pay them an excellent education.

Currently the businesswoman is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine, cloths and supplies for the dressmaking of her own line of clothing.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine, cloths and supplies for the dressmaking of her own line of clothing.

loans.name: Farruh

texts.en:
Farruh was born in 1997. He is a kind and clever man. Farruh is not married, and he lives with parents.

He is a student of the first course. He studies at the Institute of Social Subjects. He is learning law. Farruh dreams to be a good lawyer in the future.

He is asking for a loan because he must pay for the university tuition, but his parents do not have the opportunity. Farruh is asking for a loan of 7,100 somoni with this aim. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition.

loans.name: Milcah

texts.en:
Milcah is a married woman. She has four children.

She operates a retail business where she sells jackets, trousers, and sweaters. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a good area, and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes.

She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. She will use the anticipated profits to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes.

loans.name: Adah

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients, Adah, who is 44 years old and married with two daughters and one son.

Adah and her husband have been selling snacks for three years. She has asked for a loan of 7,400,000 IDR from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build sanitation facilities at their home to improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family. Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources, but Adah will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all lenders.

loans.use: to build sanitation facilities at their home to improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family.

loans.name: Marsiyah

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients, Marsiyah, who is 42 years old and married with two daughters and one son.

Marsiyah is a housewife and her husband has been an employee for four years. She has asked for a loan of 7,000,000 IDR from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build sanitation facilities at their home to improve access to clean water and sanitation for their family. Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources, but Marsiyah will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all lenders.

loans.use: to build sanitation facilities at their home to improve access to clean water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Alexandra

texts.es:
Alexandra es una mujer con grandes aspiraciones en la vida, tiene una familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 4 y 7 años de edad, es casada, esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de san Antonio Suchitepéquez.
Alexandra desde hace 5 años se dedica a la crianza de pollos, a ella le gusta esta actividad pues lo realiza desde la comunidad de su hogar y esto le permite realizar otros oficios de su casa. Alexandra también cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien trabaja como albañil.
Alexandra solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción tales como: cemento, block, arena y piedrín para finalizar la construcción de su casa y muy pronto ofrecerle a su familia un hogar más seguro.
texts.en:
Alexandra is a woman with high aspirations in life. She is married, and has a family of two children, ages 4 and 7. This beautiful family lives in the community of San Antonio Suchitepéquez.

For five years, Alexandra has been engaged in raising chickens. She enjoys this activity because she can do it in her home community, and this allows her to perform other jobs from home. She also has the support of her husband, who is a bricklayer.

She is requesting the loan to purchase building materials such as cement blocks, sand, and gravel to finish the construction of her house, and very soon provide her family with a safer home.

loans.use: to purchase building materials such as cement blocks, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Yurley Maritza

texts.es:
Ella Es Yurley una mujer que realiza sus actividades con mucha alegría y entusiasmo, vende mercancía en un punto de venta y también de manera ambulantes, es una persona recursiva que en su actitud, forma de hablar y realizar sus actividades, se le nota esas ganas de progreso y de salir adelante.
Vive en unión libre con su pareja es madre de dos hijos, la mayor de 11 años y el menor de tan solo 15 meses de edad.
Yurley se ha trazado dos grandes objetivos en su vida, el primero y más importante es pagar la educación de sus dos hijos y el otro es un sueño que ha perseguido desde que cumplió la mayoría de edad que es, comprar una vivienda.
Como esta próxima la temporada de diciembre, ella se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para abastecerse de ropa, mercancía, calzado para hombre y mujer.
texts.en:
This is Yurley, a woman who does her work with lots of joy and enthusiasm. She sells merchandise at a retail site and also as a street vendor. She's a resourceful person whose desire to get ahead is apparent in her attitude, the way she talks, and the way she does her work.

Yurley cohabitates with her partner and is the mother of two children, the oldest is 11 years old and the youngest is just 15 months old. Yurley has set two big goals for herself in life, the first and most important is to pay for the education of her two children and the other is a dream that she has pursued since she became an adult, to purchase a home.

Since the December season is approaching, she's applying for a loan to stock up on clothes, merchandise, and footwear for men and women.

loans.use: To stock up on clothes, merchandise, and footwear for men and women.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, comenta que es madre soltera, y que estudia para poder darles una mejor vida a sus hijos.
Está estudiando el segundo año de la carrera y comenta que por medio de sus conocimientos quiere abrirse camino al mundo profesional. Su meta es terminar su facultad y así poder conseguir un trabajo y darle un buen futuro a mis hijos y a la vez a sus padres.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Maribel is from Ybycuí.  She is studying for a nursing degree.  She says that she is a single mother, and she is studying to provide her children with a better life.  She is in the second year of her degree, and says that through her knowledge, she wants to open the road to the professional world.  Her goal is to complete her degree, and thus be able to get a job, and provide a better future for her children as well as her parents.  She is requesting this loan to pay her degree fees and, in this way, be able to continue with her studies as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 29-year-old single man who left school at the elementary level to help in covering the needs and expenses of his family. He started twenty years ago to work in selling fruits and vegetables with a friend where he gained a wide experience in this domain. He decided, two years ago, to start working with his own fruit and vegetable cart.

Mohamad is a hard worker and an ambitious man who is well-known in his region. Today, he is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to expand his merchandise with new kinds of fruits and vegetables to attract more customers and satisfy all the demand.

Mohamad hopes to expand his business more in the future through opening his own shop to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise with new sorts of fruits and vegetables to attract more customers.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony, who is in his late 20's, is a single father of one child who is still in school. He has been running several businesses: a genge (grocery store), boda boda (transportation service) and charcoal selling for six years now. He works from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a very good profit per month.

This will be Anthony's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase his business stock and has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loan. He used the profit to pay school fees, to reinvest in his business, for loan repayment, to take care of his family and cover household expenses.
